MenuItem.name: ADMIN_NETWORKING
MenuItem.Title: Network Configuration
MenuItem.Help: Configure the basic settings required for remote administration and network connectivity.

MenuItem.name: ADMIN_MONITOR
MenuItem.Title: System Monitor
MenuItem.Help: Monitor various system metrics. Network traffic, CPU and memory utilization, and various other statistics are presented and constantly updated to keep an eye on the general state of this system.

MenuItem.name: ADMIN_LOCKDOWN
MenuItem.Title: System Lockdown
MenuItem.Help: Sets the system in lockdown mode. In this mode, the network firewall policies are set to drop all incoming packets, forwarding is disabled, and the system can only be managed from this console.

MenuItem.name: ADMIN_FIRMWARE
MenuItem.Title: Firmware Updates
MenuItem.Help: Checks for updates to the system firmware. If updates are available, they can be downloaded directly and installed.

MenuItem.name: ADMIN_REBOOT
MenuItem.Title: Reboot System
MenuItem.Help: Reboots the system. This will cause a temporary disrution in network services provided by this system.

MenuItem.name: ADMIN_SHUTDOWN
MenuItem.Title: Halt System
MenuItem.Help: Shuts down the system. This safely shuts the system by properly saving any log files, configurations, and unwritten disk contents. This will also initiate a transfer of services if this system is part of a fail-over cluster.
